original_text: And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the Lord had given him rest round about from all his enemies;
korean_text: 여호와께서 주위의 모든 원수를 무찌르사 왕으로 궁에 평안히 살게 하신 때에

sentences.original_text: when the king sat in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그의 집에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and the Lord had given him rest
round about from all his enemies
